KitKat3::

She heard the converstaion and felt like she needed to say 
something. "I wouldn't go into an allience with anyone who sides with 
the maximals.  How can a pred call themselves a prdacon when they 
fight alongside a maximal. It's not right. It's against my program to 
trust a maximal, and I don't know a pred who would. But if want to 
enter into this, you must be certain that you keep a tight leash on 
him, or he'll kill you."

She stopped as her optics flickered a second, then returned to 
normal. She looked at the group. "Well, it's up to you bots."  She 
turned and walked out of the room.

>

he's

>

> the Alliance... we must be awared... We don't know what Zardus 
wants 
> with this alliance. If anyone have other thing to say, I like tell 
> you something else"
>
